MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the DG7 postcode area of Castle Douglas, affecting properties in Haugh of Urr and surrounding areas. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 10:21am. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of a broken electricity pole and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 8pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1:33pm on 31st of October 2020.
